name: Lt. Gov. Brent Sanford
tweet: We have expedited the process to identify and reduce the exposure to the current level and we hope that people are seeing that the answer is for no new investments in Russia, and an absolute plan for exiting the investments with Russian connection. 3/3

name: Lt. Gov. Brent Sanford
tweet: Board members were informed today that Russian exposure has already been reduced by $5.9 million, or 37 percent, to $10 million, as investment managers have exited investment positions and the value of investments with Russian exposure has dropped. 2/

name: Lt. Gov. Brent Sanford
tweet: The State Investment Board today voted to divest of investments in Russian entities or securities issued by Russian entities, as board members learned that Russian investment exposure already has been reduced by more than one-third since Monday. 1/   https://t.co/ddCdzzx6d1

name: Lt. Gov. Brent Sanford
tweet: North Dakota has received, reviewed and is implementing advice from the @USTreasury related to investments in Russia. The situation is fluid and additional guidance is forthcoming. The State Investment Board will meet Thursday to discuss the situation.   https://t.co/tJZIc0sll8
